data.title: What Will They Learn?
data.meta_description: Regent University - What Will They Learn? - According to its mission statement, 'Regent University serves as a center of Christian thought and action to provide excellent education through a biblical perspective and global context equipping Christian leaders to change the world.'
data.text: According to its mission statement, 'Regent University serves as a center of Christian thought and action to provide excellent education through a biblical perspective and global context equipping Christian leaders to change the world.' [Source]
